entry.title: Dual Funding Proposal
entry.summary: Lisa Neigut has provided a list of variables including scriptlen, script, max_extra_witness_len, wscriptlen, and wscript. She asks if the script mentioned here is the scriptPubKey required for hashPrevouts in BIP143. Additionally, she wants to know what wscript is and if it is the same as scriptCode in BIP143. Rusty speculates that wscript could be the BIP141 witnessScript, but this can complicate P2WPKH where an empty witnessScript means P2WPKH. He confirms that non-SegWit inputs are not disallowed due to malleability problems.
